amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the expansion of access to the income tax credit for employee health insurance expenses of small employers.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 391 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 391 proposed by Senator Coons. (consideration: CR S1877, S1881-1882; text: CR S1877) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the expansion of access to the income tax credit for employee health insurance expenses of small employers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 391 proposed by Senator Coons.
